extendedInfo.description: A Digital Clock widget with size 4x2It features:212 skins12/24 hr+Color on all info displayedSystem Stats Info + pop-upWeather & Forecast2 Weather layouts on clock(user choice)2 Forecast layouts(user choice)+tap bottom right->preferences+tap bottom left->system information dialog+tap weather icon->forecast+tap Hour->launch anything!(more coming)+tap Minutes->launch anything!Widgets on Android work a bit differently than a normal application. Unlike regular programs they don't just install themselves in the application tray so you have to add them manually. They will not open or launch.Here's how to add a widget on your Android home screen.STEPS HOW TO ADD A WIDGET==========================1.On your Android home screen, tap any blank or âemptyâ area with size 4x2 and hold down your finger.2.An âAdd to Home screenâ window will pop up. From that window, tap âWidgetsâ.3.Youâll be presented with a list of all the installed Widgets on your Android device.4.Select the clock to add to your home screen by tapping it.Notes====="Time frozen/not updating"-> taskiller killed the clock(exclude it from taskillers)When phone starts, clock starts in less than a min too.ROM users-> make sure the clock is NOT moved on SD card.Widgets are not supposed to be on SD card. Move it back to the phone storage.Weather hint: For world destinations with two words in the name, type in the box the words with a plus sign.For example "Buenos Aires" type "Buenos+Aires",remember the "+" sign -no spaces, don't include the quotes.Skins: Check our website for help, and send to us your creations.Email problems/suggestionsCheck our website for more help.EXCLUDE IT FROM TASKILLERS!!!Be polite, this is a free app :-)VIDEO HOW TO ADD WIDGETShttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpMLF9b2aTQ

reviews.title: Did it\'s job
reviews.comment: Lately is been shrinking in size on its own. But I\'ve used this widget for a very long time with no problems. It\'s just TIME for a change!   ;-)
reviews.author: Moonie Dapas

reviews.title: Very Beautiful.
reviews.comment: Everything that I could want in a clock.  Perfect, Thanks for this app, it\'s the best out there.
reviews.author: Vickie Hollis

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I\'ll put the widget on my home screen, and it will work great for like two minutes, and then it will just freeze for no reason and the time won\'t change anymore. Please fix, it\'s a beautiful clock adn I love making my own skins for it.
reviews.author: Emily Lentz

reviews.title: Disappointed: (
reviews.comment: Up until the last latest update this application worked perfectly... it was everything I wanted but after the update it keeps freezing and shutting down. Very disappointed and now I must uninstall and find a new clock!
reviews.author: Scarlet Frost

reviews.title: Absolutely awesome
reviews.comment: I have had this clock for two years now I love it
reviews.author: Jennifer Jackson

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work right anymore
reviews.comment: Used to work perfectly. Now it resets all my settings back to the defaults daily. Very annoying. Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: A great add on clock. Very easy to customize with many different options.  Works as described.

reviews.comment: Flexible application and adjustable colors

reviews.comment: I\'ve tried tons of clock apps and this is by far the best. It\'s easy to read and customizable.

reviews.comment: Its a nice looking ap with good skins but can you please change the weather icon to realtime colour instead of pink. Its spoils the the look  Thanks

reviews.comment: @Haley No duh. You have to go through widgets for any clock. I like it. Works wonderful on my Samsung Fascinate.

reviews.comment: Great concept; beautiful Widgets, only time never updates & it keeps force closing when I enter in to edit. HTC EVO

reviews.comment: Wont keep weather info for my city, can\'t get rid of weather to just use the clock. Uninstall!
